text: Jakarta! is the first novel by writer Christophe Dorigné-Thomson, published by the Indonesian media conglomerate Kompas Gramedia Group in 2012.Jakarta!, Gramedia Pustaka Utama, 2012 Jakarta! was widely promoted in the mediaSarah Sechan show, Net TV and endorsed by major Indonesian figures such as businessman and owner of football club Inter Milan Erick Thohir, businessman and politician Sandiaga Uno, politician Irman Gusman, Minister of Education Anies Baswedan and actor Rio Dewanto. The novel tells the story of a young European who travels the world on missions paid by governments or multinationals to kill high-level targets. The book is, in fact, a disguised essay on geopolitical shifts and their consequences.In New Novel, Jakarta Is the End of An Unlikely Journey, The Jakarta Globe, 01 December 2012 The author's second book, WNI Dilarang Baca!, was published by Mizan Group in 2015. == References == == External links == * www.gramediapustakautama.com/buku-detail/86284/Jakarta! Category:Spy novels Category:2012 novels Category:Indonesian novels
title: Jakarta!
